# Shasta 2023

This was a trip that [Ben Ruef](https://www.instagram.com/benruef) and I took right after finals week of Spring 2023. We road triped from Santa Cruz, to Mt. Shasta, then we stopped in Ashland Oregon while on our way to Promontory in Northwest California.
